trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Hillsboro
There was one other sighting in Hillsboro on or around August 5th 2008
Summary: starlike object staying in same spot in the sky just bouncing around
divs: sighting detailslast night i observed a starlike object in the sky proceeded by a triangle craft. earlier this evening my daughter and i observed a starlike object moving towards us. we thought it was a plane that was getting closer. all the sudden the object fell towards the ground and disappeared like a falling star. at around 10:25pm tonight i was sitting out on my patio when i noticed another starlike object that just stayed in the same place for almost 10 minutes. i thought to myself if it was a plane wouldn't it move position. it just bounced around a little. last night when i witnessed the two crafts i grabbed my camera but when i turned it on all i got was static. after an hour my camera was fine again. tonight i got the object on video, however, my camera was full of static again. i had a hard time attaching the video as it is very long so i am pasting a link to photobucket here. http:\\s302.photobucket.com\albums\nn120\funjay\?action=view���t=cyclinghagglake.flv
